title: Microsoft Office ProPlus 2007 SP3 VL x86 en-US November 2015
description:
**********************************************************************
Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2007 SP3 VL x86 en-US November 2015
**********************************************************************

Includes: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Publisher, Access, InfoPath, Communicator

Release Info
------------

- Language: en-US
- Channel: Volume License
- Version: 12.0.6607.1000
- File format: DAA (PowerIso compressed ISO file)

Added updates 10/11/2015
------------------------

Update for Microsoft Office Outlook 2007 Junk Email Filter (KB3101557)
Security Update for Microsoft Office Excel 2007 (KB3101554)
Security Update for Microsoft Office InfoPath 2007 (KB2687406)
Security Update for Microsoft Office Word 2007 (KB3085552)
Security Update for Microsoft Office PowerPoint 2007 (KB3085548)
Security Update for Microsoft Office Publisher 2007 (KB2880506)
Security Update for Microsoft Office Compatibility Pack Service Pack 3 (KB3085551)
Security Update for Microsoft Office Access 2007 (KB2596614)
Security Update for Microsoft Office 2007 suites (KB3085620)
Security Update for Microsoft Office OneNote 2007 (KB2889915)
Security Update for Microsoft Office Compatibility Pack Service Pack 3 (KB3101558)
Security Update for Microsoft Office 2007 suites (KB3101555)

Installation
------------

If you have PowerIso installed, just convert DAA file to ISO format
If you don't: extract all files into the same folder and run the batch file Makeiso (this will convert the DAA file to ISO)

- Mount or burn ISO file
- Install Office 2007 using one of the provided keys in key.txt
- Install Office File Validation + Visual Studio for Office Runtime (required) from folder "Run after install"
- Customize your installation with included Add-ins: Classic Menu for Office 2007 v7.50, FileFormatConverters, PowerPointViewer, SaveAsPDFandXPS, Wordview

Please SEED for a while!
